t:
all the memories came rushing back.

Here I was, after so many years, visiting my childhood home.





And there it was, my skeleton, still hanging from the crossbar.
c:
The house was in shambles, but the blood stains were still visible.



Write a #shortstory that begins with #wheniopenedthedoor   #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba
